#2 Copyright - zoozlerfy

Personally, I use gradient colors (red to yellow) to decorate Zoozler's copyright. This work can be boring and annoyting. I made a code snippet that will automatically put gradient color decoration and current year of a date.

// At your html file (index.html)
<h1 zoozlerfy data-copyright='true'>Here will be copyright<h2>
<h2 zoozlerfy data-copyright='true'>Here will be copyright<h2>
<h3 zoozlerfy data-copyright='true'>Here will be copyright<h2>
<h1 zoozlerfy data-copyright='false'>Here will be copyright<h2>
<h2 zoozlerfy data-copyright='false'>Here will be copyright<h2>
<h3 zoozlerfy data-copyright='false'>Here will be copyright<h2>

Example

Here is Zoozler

Here is Zoozler

Here is Zoozler

Here is Zoozler

Here is Zoozler

Here is Zoozler
